replies.body:
@NolanDalton
Apple = Company
Windows = Operating System

So lets start with the companies Apple Vs Microsoft. Apple wins due to it making products and operating systems that I like and prefer. 
In regards to operating systems OSX and Windows are very evenly matched. Usually for laptops I will always go with a macbook running OSX as it as the most productive OS for school/editing/general use. However for a PC which I would normally use for gaming/editing I would run windows 8.1.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Mine is: Diamond encrusted, magnelium plated, lithulniumic plutoniumishaniableic handle, with a leather strap. I enherited it from my Father who inherited it from his father, who inherited it from his father, who inherited it from his father, who inherited it from his father, who inherited it from his father, who inherited it from his father, who inherited it from his father, and so on. It was originally built from 4 of the most powerful beings in the universe: two Broonic Lumberjacks (known as the Broonic Brothers) and two Dwarnic Elves; father and son. They came together as one and forged the most majestic and powerful blade in history, more powerful than Gandalf the White's wand, more powerful than The chosen one's lightsaber, even more powerful than The Master Sword. The axe, was named Stung. Plus it looks cool.

The rest of the story lies in my hands and is forbidden to be shared with beings, other than Lumberjacks or Elves. So the story cannot be resumed in such a human inhabited location. I may have to resume it with you over the Skyple cloud notification system. Or an alternative would be the Tweetle birdish communication system. However we may not use the FacleBook as that is forbidden to all Lumberjacks under the age of Four Hundred and Seventy five point Three, Seven, Eight. Or in human words 14.
